channel.title: Goodbye Teamprise, Hello Team Explorer Everywhere
channel.description: In case you missed it, as part of Bob Muglia’s keynote announcing the launch of Visual Studio 2010 last week he also announced the launch of Microsoft® Visual Studio® Team Explorer Everywhere 2010. This is the initial release of...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by ryan+00:00
item.description: will 'codeplex only' licenses still exist for TEE like they did for teamprise?
item.dc:creator: ryan

item.title: Comment by Martin Woodward+00:00
item.description: Ryan - yes, we still provide a complimentary CodePlex license. See http://codeplex.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Obtaining%20the%20Team%20Explorer%20Everywhere%20Client for more details but basically you download the trial version then enter the license key given on the CodePlex page.
item.dc:creator: Martin Woodward
